articles.title: Amid rising cases, high price of flu shot a concern, say doctors - The Indian Express
articles.description: Influenza vaccines, often called 'flu shots', are vaccines that protect against the four influenza viruses - two subtypes of influenza A and two lineages of influenza B. The price of the shots range from Rs 1,500 to Rs 2,000.
